name: Divinia Chronicles: Relics of Gan-Ti
description: Explore a detailed fantasy world, master fierce dungeons and face mighty adversaries in this unique 3rd person Action-RPG with story driven single-player campaign.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Vista / XP Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 2.0b (ATI Radeon X800 or higher / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or higher / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher). DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
